resources.string: AI technology that allows you to have human-like conversations to get tasks done and much more with the chatbot.
icon image of Bard AI tool
Google\'s AI is trained to be informative and comprehensive. It can generate human-like text in response to a wide range of prompts.
Based on the GPT-4 model, it is capable of turning data into accurate answers. It can only be accessed through Bing Browser.
icon image of DALL-E 2 AI Tool
Deep Learning model developed by OpenAI to generate digital images from natural language descriptions.
icon image of Caktus AI tool
AI writing tool designed specifically for students, offering features such as writing code, essays, paragraphs, and even maths.
icon image of Jasper AI tool
Instantly Generate High Quality Copy For Emails, Ads, Websites, Listings, Blogs & More. Saves your time and money.
Jenni AI is a personal writing assistant that will make sure you never face the writer\'s block while writing a research or blog.
An editor to help you polish your academic writing, it has a MS Word plugin so you can edit within MS Word.
an icon image of Scholarcy AI
A personal reading assistant that creates summaries of research papers with unfamiliar terms hyperlinked to Wikipedia.
It is ChatGPT for research papers, just upload a paper and start asking it questions regarding the paper.
Simply describe the formula or logic and see Sheet+ create it for you. This one is definitely not to missed if you use spreadsheets.
icon image of Simplified AI tool
It is an AI swiss knife! It has an image editor, video creator, AI copywriter and social media management!
icon image of Ocoya AI tool
Ocoya helps create and schedule content on social media, it also has an AI copywriter to write amazing captions.
icon image of Polarr AI tool
This incredible tool transforms text into photos, videos and designs which can be edited to your preference.
icon image of SEO GPT tool
This incredible tool helps write keyword optimized content that can bypass AI-content detectors and its 100% Free!
icon image of Krisp AI tool
Touted as the World\'s No.1 app for noise cancellation on online meetings, Krisp improves voice clarity, removes echo, takes notes.
icon image of Runway AI tool
This is ChatGPT for visual content including images and videos. Type your prompt and create videos in minutes.
icon image of Looka AI tool
AI-powered platform to design Branding Kit! It gives a logo, business card, letter head and all the branding essentials.
icon image of Lumen5 AI tool
Lumen5 can read your blog, convert it into a summary and create a video which you can edit to fit your style.
icon image of SpiritMe AI tool
Type any text and upload your pic. It converts your text into a video where you\'re speaking in your voice and emotions.
icon image of InVideo AI tool
It can generate scripts from text prompts and convert them into natural sounding voiceover videos.
icon image of Murf AI tool
Murf helps make life-like studio-quality voice overs in just minutes for podcasts, videos and wherever audio is needed.
icon image of Speechify AI tool
Known as the World\'s No. 1 AI voiceover generator, Speechify creates voiceover for videos, podcasts, presentations etc.
This feature will be added in the next update.
